name: Barkr-Project
description: This is a website for the Barkr app

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin adventure.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/adventure.html && usemin care.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/care.html && usemin dog-home.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/dog-home.html && usemin care.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/care.html && usemin talk-to.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/talk-to.html && usemin care.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/care.html

author: Dan Haas
